objects.name: Analytic 1099
objects.description: Monitor for runtime manipulation by observing changes in application bundles, unexpected signing modifications, and runtime API calls that inject or alter how data is displayed. Detect alterations in CFNetwork or CoreFoundation frameworks responsible for rendering data.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unexpected application binary modifications or altered signing status

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: CALCULATE: Mismatch in file integrity of critical macOS applications

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelisted applications expected to handle sensitive runtime data.
Policy enforcement for validating application code signing integrity.
